abstract: Tech giants like eBay, Facebook and Google acknowledge that they have work to do to increase diversity, but the repetition of that sentiment shows how little has changed.
snippet: Tech giants like eBay, Facebook and Google acknowledge that they have work to do to increase diversity, but the repetition of that sentiment shows how little has changed.
lead_paragraph: When Facebook released its workplace diversity numbers on Thursday, the company included a somewhat heartening message.

headline.main: Behind Silicon Valley’s Self-Critical Tone on Diversity, a Lack of Progress
headline.print_headline: Behind Silicon Valley’s Self-Critical Tone on Diversity, a Lack of Progress
